hooks.command: if [ -n "$AGENT_TASK_ID" ]; then agent-inbox report running "$AGENT_TASK_ID" 2>/dev/null; fi
if [ -n "$AGENT_TASK_ID" ]; then agent-inbox report complete "$AGENT_TASK_ID" && notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Finished generating' 2>/dev/null; fi
if [ -n "$AGENT_TASK_ID" ]; then agent-inbox report exited "$AGENT_TASK_ID" 2>/dev/null; fi
